thread.title: Column: Cubs finally have a team that can end the curse
thread.title_full: Column: Cubs finally have a team that can end the curse

title: Column: Cubs finally have a team that can end the curse
text: > Georgia Column: Cubs finally have a team that can end the curse FILE - In this Sept. 28, 2015, file photo, Chicago Cubs' Chris Denorfia has water dumped on him by teammates Anthony Rizzo, left, and Dexter Fowler, right, after a walk-off home run against the Kansas City Royals during the 11th inning of a baseball game in Chicago. Only the uniforms link these Cubs to those loveable losers of the past. This club, inside and out, is built to finally end the franchiseâ€™s 107-year championship curse.(AP Photo/Andrew A. Nelles, File)
